element.name: TChartBasicAxis
element.short: TChartBasicAxis is the ancestor of the chart's axis class

ul.li: ticks (short line strokes perpendicular to the axis direction)
marks, i.e. labels placed at the tick positions
grid lines starting at the tick positions and running across the entire chart
an optional arrow at the end of the axis line

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Visible
element.short: If switched to false the axis is hidden along with ticks and labels.

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.TickLength
element.short: Length of the (outer) axis ticks (in pixels)

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.TickInnerLength
element.short: Length of the inner axis ticks (in pixels)

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Grid
element.short: Determines wether the axis has grid lines and how they are displayed

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Intervals
element.short: Determines how the tick intervals of the axis are calculated.

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Alignment
element.short: Defines the side of the chart at which the axis is shown

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Arrow
element.short: Determines whether and how an arrow is drawn at the end of the axis

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Marks
element.short: Provides parameters how labels ("marks") are to be drawn at the axis

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.IsFlipped
element.short: Returns true when the axis is drawn in the opposite direction (right-to-left, or top-to-bottom)
element.descr: In TChartBasicAxis, the function always returns false. It is overridden by its descendant TChartAxis which conisiders the state of the axis' Inverted and chart's BiDiMode properties.

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Create
element.short: Creates the axis as an element of the specified chart and as a member of the axislist given as ACollection

element.name: TChartBasicAxis.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the axis and removes it from the collection to which it belongs.

element.name: TChartAxisGridPen
element.short: Defines the parameters used to draw the grid of the axis.

element.name: TChartAxisAlignment
element.descr: The TChartAxisAlignment determines whether the associated axis is at the left, top, right or bottom side of the chart.
